short_description: new ellis group is a business consulting company based in new hope, pennsylvania, united states.
long_description: the new ellis group helps professional services firms increase business development through strategic business planning, coaching, and training. each client engagement is highly customized to address the specific needs of the individual, the corporate or firm culture, and the particular skills sets required. with creativity and energy, the new ellis group helps organizations and individuals learn how to leverage their strategic networks for successful long-term relationships. since 1997, the new ellis group has provided strategic planning and business development consulting to companies and associations in a wide array of industries, including the law firms, publishing, software, advertising, sports media, graphic design, manufacturing, commercial real estate, and distance learning. karen kaplowitz is president of the new ellis group, a business development consulting firm specializing in business development strategy, training and coaching for law firms and other professional service providers.
generated_description: the new ellis group, legally known as alschuler grossman & pines llp, is a business development consulting firm based in solebury township, pennsylvania. founded in 1997 by karen kaplowitz, a former trial lawyer in los angeles, the company specializes in strategic planning, business development, and strategic alliances for law firms and other professional service providers. the new ellis group offers customized coaching, training, and strategic planning services to help organizations and individuals enhance their business development capabilities. their clientele spans various industries, including law firms, publishing, software, advertising, sports media, graphic design, manufacturing, commercial real estate, and distance learning.
